channel.title: üè¢ Microsoft Research on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Microsoft Research on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: rStar-Math: Small LLMs Can Master Math Reasoning with Self-Evolved Deep Thinking
item.description: Small language models can master complex math reasoning using self-evolved deep thinking via Monte Carlo Tree Search, surpassing larger models in performance.

item.title: GeAR: Generation Augmented Retrieval
item.description: GeAR, a new retrieval model, boosts accuracy by combining document retrieval with fine-grained information generation, leading to better understanding and improved localization.

item.title: MixLLM: LLM Quantization with Global Mixed-precision between Output-features and Highly-efficient System Design
item.description: MixLLM achieves state-of-the-art LLM compression by using mixed-precision quantization between output features, improving accuracy and system efficiency.

item.title: VidTok: A Versatile and Open-Source Video Tokenizer
item.description: VidTok: an open-source, top performing video tokenizer.

item.title: OLA-VLM: Elevating Visual Perception in Multimodal LLMs with Auxiliary Embedding Distillation
item.description: OLA-VLM boosts multimodal LLMs’ visual understanding by distilling knowledge from specialized visual encoders into the LLM’s internal representations during pretraining, achieving significant performa…

item.title: Phi-4 Technical Report
item.description: Phi-4: a 14B parameter LLM surpassing its teacher model (GPT-4) in STEM-focused QA through innovative synthetic data generation and post-training techniques.

item.title: Multimodal Latent Language Modeling with Next-Token Diffusion
item.description: LatentLM: a novel multimodal model unifying discrete & continuous data via next-token diffusion, surpassing existing methods in performance & scalability across various tasks.

item.title: Florence-VL: Enhancing Vision-Language Models with Generative Vision Encoder and Depth-Breadth Fusion
item.description: Florence-VL enhances vision-language models by incorporating a generative vision encoder and a novel depth-breadth fusion architecture, achieving state-of-the-art results on various benchmarks.

item.title: MH-MoE:Multi-Head Mixture-of-Experts
item.description: MH-MoE: A novel implementation of Multi-Head Mixture-of-Experts achieves superior performance in large language models by enhancing efficiency without sacrificing model size or computational cost.

item.title: BitNet a4.8: 4-bit Activations for 1-bit LLMs
item.description: BitNet a4.8 achieves comparable performance to existing 1-bit LLMs, but with significantly faster inference, by using a hybrid quantization and sparsification strategy for 4-bit activations.

item.title: LLM2CLIP: Powerful Language Model Unlock Richer Visual Representation
item.description: LLM2CLIP boosts CLIP’s performance by cleverly integrating LLMs, enabling it to understand longer, more complex image captions and achieving state-of-the-art results across various benchmarks.
